title: 23: S5E23 – "Watch and Burn" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four terrifying tales from authors Kenneth Kohl, Gareth Shore, Michael Whitehouse, and Kris Mallory, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about irresponsible experiments, ruinous regrets, sinister strolls, and oceanic atrocities. 




Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
